runs.comm: fractionally short and outside off, Raza is a touch early into an attempted cut, and ends up dribbling it back to the bowler off the inside half
similar length, much wider now, slashed straight to cover point
pitched up and wobbles away outside off, no stroke offered
back of a length and on middle, not much pace from Mashrafe. The batsman jumps across off, picks it up over backward square leg, as the ball trickles away to the boundary
That's the riposte. Mashrafe brings in a slower ball outside off, Raza dances out but can't manufacture his own pace. He flaps it to mid-off, where Liton gobbles it up
nice and full on middle, pushed to mid-off
back of a length and hurries on off, seams in as well. Chakabva jumps back in defence
banged in short and cuts back in as the batsman rushes down the track. Pops off the thigh pad to the right of a diving Mushfiq. Fortunate runs for Zimbabwe

Al-Amin follows his captain's lead and strikes in his first over. Chakabva feigns away outside off, Al-Amin is smart enough to shorten his length to mess up with Chakabva's attempted lap-scoop. The opener can only lob it in the air as Mushfiq plunges forward to snaffle it
skiddy length ball, beats the flick, and hits the pad
full and zips through outside off, Williams' feet went nowhere as he flayed and missed
clipped square off the pads for one
short and wide outside off, slapped straight to cover
Mashrafe tests Williams with a short one, dragged to mid-on for a hustled one

Mashrafe nails the middle stump and takes high-fives from his team-mates. Zimbabwe are three down inside three overs. Pretty full and curls back in, beats the defences, and rattles the furniture. The ball kept low as well to hoodwink Chigumbura
tight and attacking off, blocked back
back of a length outside off, stays low again. Pushed to the covers
neatly tucked off the pads through backward square leg
full and slides away with the angle outside off from over the wicket, zips past the outside edge
full and nippy, comes back in, takes the inside edge, but does not carry to Mushfiq
length and outside off, steered to backward point
the left-hand batsman is glued to the crease again as he looks to push away from the body. He gets an inside edge that evades the stumps and runs away fine
good length and attacking middle and off, chopped in front of the covers
Williams steps away outside leg but Mashrafe follows the batsman and strikes the thigh pad
nuggety nurdle off the pads in front of square
drifting onto the pads again, Ervine can't carve out an escape route. Weak flick to short mdiwicket
back of a length and keeps going away outside off, he goes for a big whoosh, off the pad and loops to the keeper
full and on middle, dragged over midwicket. Ervine comes back for the second
good length and on middle, Ervine slithers outside leg, manufactures some room, but finds the man at cover with a drive
picked away off the pads through backward square leg
back of a length and held its line outside off, waft and a miss
Mustafiz brings this full one back in and gets it to thud into the pad
full and swings in, the batsman seeks to cover drive on the up but has to settle with an inside edge that wanders away to leg

Mustafiz drops a return catch. He unfurls his signature cutter outside off, Williams has no clue about it, he is early into his shot and spoons it back. Mustafiz, in his followthrough, stretches his right hand, and shells it. Perhaps, he should have attempted with both hands
back of a length and swings in, kept out
down the pitch and drilled down to long-off
dabbed defensively in front of point as Nasir held this back
slides on outside off, Williams can't cut it away. Beaten
Ervine comes down, meets this on a half-volley and whips it to wide long-on
flighted on off, Williams leaves the crease and lofts it back over the bowler's head
slogged away to deep midwicket as this was darted short on middle
Ervine pushes and outside-edges it towards short third man for one
clipped off the pads to deep square leg
tossed up on middle, down the pitch and driven back
short, whipped to long-on
he comes down the pitch, Nasir fires it flat and hits the thigh

bowled'em and Nasir blows kisses. Nice and much slower through the air, Nasir held this back further on seeing the batsman skip down. Williams can't connect with a big swish, and the leg stump is pegged back
straight ball on off, patted to point with an angled bat
slides quicker on off, pushed back to Nasir
starts off with a wrong'un, swing and a miss
short legbreak, flogged past the covers with a cut
half-tracker outside off, Waller latches onto it, dispatching it over long-on. He did not middle it but still gets six!
Juabair overpitches now, clubbed over wide long-on for back-to-back sixes
steered to short third man
loopier on middle, Ervine bends forward, pushing it to the covers
dropped a bit short, Waller goes deep in the crease and sends it clattering over the covers for another six
four more! Waller goes down on one knee and sweeps this full one over backward square leg
round the wicket, fired onto the pads, tickled to the fine-leg boundary with a paddle sweep
fired outside off, play and a miss
quicker through the air again, punched to midwicket off the back foot

tossed up, Waller runs down the track again, swings it rather cleanly. Tamim comes into play at the long-on boundary, he takes a overhead catch but the momentum carries him over. He aimed to flick the ball back into play... No dice
back of a length, poked to leg for one
angling away outside off, glided down to third man after shuffling across off
looks like the cutter, full on off, chipped in front of the covers
banged in and rises outside off, Waller lets it pass
pitched up and outside off, sliced over cover point. Anamul slides and manages to haul the ball in
tucked through midwicket. This was a back-of-a-length ball on middle
pushed flat and outside off, cut and a miss
full and on off, Waller gets under it and slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket
that's fifty off 20 balls for Waller. Fullish and on middle, nudged in front of square for one. Fastest fifty by a Zimbabwe player in T20s
down the track and chipped in front of long-on. Ervine passes the strike to Waller
Waller comes down, Mahmudullah shortens his length. Punched past covers
cracked to deep cover. They scamper across for the second
Waller's aggression rubs off on Ervine. He charges down the pitch and lifts this shorter one over mid-off
back of a length and outside off, dragged to mid-on
Waller is on fire! fractionally short and outside off, he camps back and swings it down the ground, bisecting long-on and long-off. One-bounce four
Ervine targets the leg side with a whip but does not connect. Off the thigh and sneaks to the covers
back of a length, on off, chopped to point
turns outside off, slog and a miss
Ervine misses a straight one, which keeps low as well. He can't connect with a leg-side swipe. Mahmudullah hits middle and leg
short ball, punched back to the bowler
flighted, pushed back
flicked straight to mid-on after rocking back
darted flat and outside off, Jongwe fiddles with it and nearly drags it back onto the stumps
low full toss on off, slog swept to deep midwicket

No celebrations from Jubair, more relief than joy. Pushed through on middle with a hint of extra bounce, Jongwe aims to reverse sweep but can't put bat on it. The forefinger goes up. Maiden T20 wicket for the 20-year old spinner
quicker ball, shoots low outside off, chopped to the covers
short and wide, spins away, slapped to the covers

After being taken for 17 in his first over, Jubair strikes back with two wickets in his second. Madziva jumps out, looks to launch it down the ground, but holes out to long-off. The Hossains combine to dismiss Madziva
lifting short ball outside off, pulled to fine leg
top strike! Full ball on off, Waller makes some swinging room and wallops it over extra cover
back of a length and around off, glanced backward of square
full and on middle, defended to point. Chisoro is sent back by Waller
hacked wide of the covers for two
Chisoro leaps across off and pushes a single down the ground
full and wide outside off, Chisoro can't slice it away
a big appeal for caught behind from Mushfiq. The umpire isn't interested. Full and tails back in outside off, drive.. and does not connect
Mustafiz pulls his length back outside off, Chisoro leans back and rides it to third man
Waller shuffles across off and slogs this full ball to backward square leg, where Jubair dives full stretch and shows off his reflexes
full and on off, Chisoro can't get under it properly. Swiped over midwicket

Mustafiz ends Waller's onslaught. Two men converge on the ball at deep midwicket. Liton grabs it. Fullish and on middle and leg, swung off the pads, but Waller did not pack enough power behind that hit
short, slogged behind square on the leg side
short again, pulled over square leg
Al-Amin keeps it short, Chisoro does not connect with a pull, this was a bit too quick for the batsman. He manages an edge and gets to the other end
Al-Amin strikes the top of middle. Shortish and angled in, Cremer misses the leg-side hoick. Al-Amin hits
Al-Amin finishes off with a bouncer. This one takes off and beats Panyangara's hook
back of a length and curves back in, beats the inside edge. The pair sneak in a bye
bouncer outside off, Panyangara aims to pull and top-edges it over the keeper; one-bounce four
Mustafiz wraps up the innings. He fires a yorker on middle and leg, Panyangara is pinged on his toes. That was pretty adjacent and Zimbabwe have been bowled out for 131
